feed.title: Would anyone object to adding a dlopen message hook system?

entry.title: Would anyone object to adding a dlopen message hook system?
entry.summary: In a peer-to-peer network, maintaining a connection with some peers may require sending micropayments at a certain rate to ensure high-quality service. This creates an optional pay layer while also increasing resistance against Distributed Denial of Service (DDOS) attacks in the fallback layer.
